element.short: Implicit meaning when this element is missing
element.definition: The Implicit meaning that is to be understood when this element is missing (e.g. 'when this element is missing, the period is ongoing'.
element.comment: Implicit meanings for missing values can only be specified on a resource, data type, or extension definition, and never in a profile that applies to one of these. An implicit meaning for a missing value can never be changed, and specifying one has the consequence that constraining its use in profiles eliminates use cases as possibilities, not merely moving them out of scope.
